DOC.brief_summary: This single-arm observational trial device ( Compass Vascular Access , Centurion Medical Products , Williamston MI ) . The device compact , sterile , single-use extravascular blood pressure transducer . This pressure measurement aid confirmation appropriate venous access . The investigator plan enroll 40 consent patient BMI ≥35 require central venous catheterization clinical reason independent existence study . The primary outcome operator satisfaction .
DOC.detailed_description: Forty ( 40 ) consent patient meet inclusion/exclusion criterion single-arm observational trial prepare usual central venous catheter ( CVC ) placement . The Compass pressure measurement device include CVC placement apparatus per manufacturer 's direction . Data record placement procedure , operator satisfaction , routine patient demographic , incidence inadvertent arterial puncture .
DOC.criteria: BMI ≥35 Pregnant woman Adults unable consent NonEnglish speaker Prisoners
